title: How to Make a Salad Without Leaves in It

steps.headline: In the bowl, first thing, mix the olive oil and the white olive oil.
steps.description: Mix with the spoon and add olives, (Add as much as you think you'll need for the people you will be serving it to) let a little of the olive juice spill out of the can or plastic jar.

steps.headline: Cut the cucumber.
steps.description: There is a way to cut it that it will be easy to pick up with a fork but still a large size. If the plastic is already off of the cucumber, that is fine, if it is not, do not tear off. Cut the cucumber with plastic on and it will be easier to take off. Here's how to cut the cucumber: Cut the bit of cucumber that you are going to use off. Then, cut it in half, the halves in half, and those halves in half. It makes the perfect size!

steps.headline: Cut the tomato any way you want to.
Add tomato, feta, cucumber, and any other things you are adding in.
Serve in bowl with smaller bowls or plates, one for each of your guest, and the same spoon to scoop it out.
steps.description: Your boss, date, friends, or family, will love it and be impressed!! !

text: In the bowl, first thing, mix the olive oil and the white olive oil. Mix with the spoon and add olives, (Add as much as you think you'll need for the people you will be serving it to) let a little of the olive juice spill out of the can or plastic jar. Cut the cucumber. There is a way to cut it that it will be easy to pick up with a fork but still a large size. If the plastic is already off of the cucumber, that is fine, if it is not, do not tear off. Cut the cucumber with plastic on and it will be easier to take off. Here's how to cut the cucumber: Cut the bit of cucumber that you are going to use off. Then, cut it in half, the halves in half, and those halves in half. It makes the perfect size! Cut the tomato any way you want to.  Add tomato, feta, cucumber, and any other things you are adding in.  Mix.  Serve in bowl with smaller bowls or plates, one for each of your guest, and the same spoon to scoop it out. Your boss, date, friends, or family, will love it and be impressed!! !
